SELECT weeklist.payment_date chartTitle, NVL(weeksales.total_price,0) chartResult FROM ( select (rownum) payment_date from dual connect by level <= 7) weeklist left outer join ( select to_char(olist.payment_date,'d') payment_date, sum(total_price) total_price from order_list olist left outer join ( select sum(total_price) total_price, order_no from order_items group by order_no) oitem ON olist.order_no=oitem.order_no WHERE to_char(olist.payment_date, 'YY-MM-DD') BETWEEN to_char(trunc(sysdate,'iw') - 7, 'YY-MM-DD') AND to_char(trunc(sysdate, 'iw') - 1, 'YY-MM-DD') GROUP BY to_char(olist.payment_date, 'd') ) weeksales on weeklist.payment_date = weeksales.payment_date order by chartTitle

SELECT monthlist.dt chartTitle, NVL(newmemcnt.cnt,0) chartResult FROM ( select to_char(user_regdate,'MM') AS user_regdate, count(*) cnt from customer_info where to_char(user_regdate,'yyyy') = '2022' group by to_char(user_regdate,'MM')) newmemcnt right outer join ( select lpad(level,2,'0') as dt from dual connect by level <= 12) monthlist ON newmemcnt.user_regdate = monthlist.dt ORDER BY chartTitle

SELECT chartTitle.dt chartTitle, NVL(chartResult.total_price,0) chartResult FROM ( select lpad(level,2,'0') as dt from dual connect by level <= 12) chartTitle left outer join ( SELECT to_char(olist.payment_date,'MM') payment_date, NVL(sum(total_price),0) total_price FROM order_list olist left outer join ( select sum(total_price) total_price, order_no from order_items group by order_no) oitem ON olist.order_no=oitem.order_no GROUP BY payment_date) chartResult ON chartTitle.dt = chartResult.payment_date ORDER BY chartTitle

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT plist.genre_no chartTitle , sum(oitem.total_price) chartResult FROM order_items oitem inner join product_list plist ON oitem.product_no = plist.product_no GROUP BY plist.genre_no ORDER BY chartResult desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT age_list chartTitle , count(*) chartResult FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(user_birth,'YYYY')) BETWEEN 10 and 19 THEN '10대' WHEN to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(user_birth,'YYYY')) BETWEEN 20 and 29 THEN '20대' WHEN to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(user_birth,'YYYY')) BETWEEN 30 and 39 THEN '30대' WHEN to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(user_birth,'YYYY')) BETWEEN 40 and 49 THEN '40대' WHEN to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(user_birth,'YYYY')) BETWEEN 50 and 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대이상' END age_list FROM customer_info) GROUP BY age_list
